title: 10 Winter Car TIPS & TRICKS you NEED to Know
author: ChrisFix
description:
If you live somewhere that gets snow, this video will teach you some helpful tips and tricks I have learned over the years to prepare your car for the snow! Learn how to remove ice from your windshield and how to remove snow from your car quickly without scratching the paint. I also show you how to prevent your door and lock from getting frozen shut and many more tips and tricks! I even show you how to use a car detailing spray to prevent the snow from sticking!

Windshield Snow/Ice Shield: https://amzn.to/3dsj3Aj
Silicone Spray: https://amzn.to/3blnREZ
Snow Removal Brush: https://amzn.to/3pG3OpY
Windshield Washer Fluid: https://advanceautoparts.rt8x.net/jWXJd6
Ceramic Spray: https://advanceautoparts.rt8x.net/15eZAx
Strong Leaf Blower: https://amzn.to/3bg1II4

Timestamps:
How to get more traction on snow and ice: 0:40
How to get out of your driveway or parking spot safely: 1:48
How to top off washer fluid: 2:51
How to prevent doors and locks from freezing: 3:13
How to prevent ice from sticking to your windshield: 5:55
How to prevent snow from sticking to shovel: 8:29
How to prevent scratching your paint while removing snow: 9:25
How to remove snow without touching it: 10:10
How to remove ice from glass: 12:43


→ As an Amazon Associate I earn from qualifying purchases.

localize.description:
如果你住的地方，得到雪，这段视频将教你一些有用的技巧和窍门，我已经学会了多年来准备你的车雪! 学习如何从挡风玻璃上除冰，以及如何在不划伤车漆的情况下快速清除汽车上的积雪。我还会告诉你如何防止你的车门和车锁被冻住，以及更多的技巧和窍门! 我甚至向您展示如何使用汽车美容喷雾剂来防止积雪粘住!

挡风玻璃防雪/防冰罩：https://amzn.to/3dsj3Aj
硅胶喷雾：https://amzn.to/3blnREZ
除雪刷：https://amzn.to/3pG3OpY
挡风玻璃清洗液：https://advanceautoparts.rt8x.net/jWXJd6
陶瓷喷涂：https://advanceautoparts.rt8x.net/15eZAx
强力吹叶机：https://amzn.to/3bg1II4

时间戳。
如何在冰雪上获得更大的牵引力。0:40
如何安全地离开车道或停车位。1:48
如何加注洗衣机油: 2:51
如何防止车门和车锁结冰: 3:13
如何防止冰块粘在挡风玻璃上: 5:55
如何防止雪粘在铁锹上：8:29
如何防止除雪时划伤车漆。9:25
如何在不碰雪的情况下除雪。10:10
如何去除玻璃上的冰块。12:43


→ 作为亚马逊的合作者，我从合格的购买中赚取收入。

→ Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/chrisfix8
→ 网站：http://www.ChrisFixed.com
→ 我的频道主页：https://www.youtube.com/ChrisFix

**如果视频对你有帮助，记得竖起 "大拇指"，考虑订阅**。

localize.description:
如果你住的地方，得到雪，這段視頻將教你一些有用的技巧和竅門，我已經學會了多年來準備你的車雪! 學習如何從擋風玻璃上除冰，以及如何在不劃傷車漆的情況下快速清除汽車上的積雪。我還會告訴你如何防止你的車門和車鎖被凍住，以及更多的技巧和竅門! 我甚至向您展示如何使用汽車美容噴霧劑來防止積雪粘住!

擋風玻璃防雪/防冰罩：https://amzn.to/3dsj3Aj
硅膠噴霧：https://amzn.to/3blnREZ
除雪刷：https://amzn.to/3pG3OpY

陶瓷噴塗：https://advanceautoparts.rt8x.net/15eZAx
強力吹葉機：https://amzn.to/3bg1II4

如何去除玻璃上的冰塊。12:43
